channel.title: Sample RSS 2.0 Feed
channel.description: A sample RSS 2.0 feed for testing feedsearch-crawler

item.title: First Test Article
item.description: This is the first test article in our sample RSS feed. It contains some basic content for testing feed parsing.
item.author: author@example.com (John Author)

item.title: Second Test Article
item.description: This is the second test article. It demonstrates how multiple items appear in an RSS feed.
item.author: author2@example.com (Jane Author)

item.title: Third Test Article with Enclosure
item.description: This article includes an enclosure, making it suitable for podcast testing.
item.author: podcast@example.com (Podcast Host)
